original_text: and one loaf of bread and one cake of bread made with oil, and one wafer out of the basket of unleavened bread that is before the Lord.
korean_text: 또 여호와 앞에 있는 무교병 광주리에서 떡 한 개와 기름 바른 과자 한 개와 전병 한 개를 가져다가

sentences.original_text: and one cake of bread made with oil
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 기름으로 만든 빵 한 개

sentences.original_text: out of the basket of unleavened bread
